job_description:
Role Overview
We are seeking experienced General Practitioners (GPs) to contribute clinical expertise toward advancing safe, evidence-based healthcare through technology-driven innovation. This is a non-clinical role — there is no direct patient care. You will evaluate and refine medical content generated by advanced systems to ensure accuracy, safety, and alignment with modern clinical practice standards.

Key Responsibilities
- Review and assess AI-generated medical responses for accuracy, safety, and consistency with current standards of care.
- Apply clinical reasoning to identify errors, omissions, or potential safety risks.
- Provide structured feedback and recommendations for improvement.
- Ensure adherence to evidence-based guidelines across primary care topics.
- Uphold medical ethics, confidentiality, and professionalism throughout the work.

Ideal Qualifications
- Medical degree (MD, DO, or equivalent international qualification).
- Active, unrestricted medical license in Canada.
- Minimum of 5 years post-residency clinical experience.
- Broad expertise in general medicine, preventive care, and chronic disease management.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to convey nuanced medical insights clearly.
- Familiarity with obesity medicine, integrative medicine, or complementary health practices is a plus.

Work Details
- Fully remote and flexible — contribute on your schedule.
- Independent contractor engagement.

Compensation: $160–$185/hour USD  
Referral Bonus: $300 for each successful referral.
